message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly lopsided, deal. I hope you'll agree!
Your offer was quite cheeky! I'm feeling generous, so let's make a deal that's fair in the long run.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile.  Let's split the difference from your last offer.
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer - meet me in the middle or risk losing even more.
